params.cTokens: The addresses of the markets to add

params.cToken: The address of the market to drop

_grantComp(address,uint256).details: Note: If there is not enough LHB, we do not perform the transfer all.

params.amount: The amount of LHB to (possibly) transfer
params.recipient: The address of the recipient to transfer LHB to

params.newBorrowCapGuardian: The address of the new Borrow Cap Guardian

returns._0: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure

_setCollateralFactor(address,uint256).details: Admin function to set per-market collateralFactor

params.cToken: The market to set the factor on
params.newCollateralFactorMantissa: The new collateral factor, scaled by 1e18

returns._0: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure. (See ErrorReporter for details)

params.compRate_: The amount of LHB wei per block to distribute

returns._0: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure. (See ErrorReporter for details)

_setMarketBorrowCaps(address[],uint256[].details: Admin or borrowCapGuardian function to set the borrow caps. A borrow cap of 0 corresponds to unlimited borrowing.

params.cTokens: The addresses of the markets (tokens) to change the borrow caps for
params.newBorrowCaps: The new borrow cap values in underlying to be set. A value of 0 corresponds to unlimited borrowing.

params.newPauseGuardian: The address of the new Pause Guardian

returns._0: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure. (See enum Error for details)

_setPriceOracle(address).details: Admin function to set a new price oracle

returns._0: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure (see ErrorReporter.sol for details)

_supportMarket(address).details: Admin function to set isListed and add support for the market

params.cToken: The address of the market (token) to list

returns._0: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure. (See enum Error for details)

params.borrowAmount: The amount of underlying the account would borrow
params.borrower: The account which would borrow the asset
params.cToken: The market to verify the borrow against

returns._0: 0 if the borrow is allowed, otherwise a semi-opaque error code (See ErrorReporter.sol)

params.borrowAmount: The amount of the underlying asset requested to borrow
params.cToken: Asset whose underlying is being borrowed

params.account: The address of the account to check

returns._0: True if the account is in the asset, otherwise false.

params.holder: The address to claim LHB for

params.cTokens: The list of markets to claim LHB in
params.holder: The address to claim LHB for

params.borrowers: Whether or not to claim LHB earned by borrowing
params.cTokens: The list of markets to claim LHB in
params.holders: The addresses to claim LHB for
params.suppliers: Whether or not to claim LHB earned by supplying

params.cTokens: The list of addresses of the cToken markets to be enabled

returns._0: Success indicator for whether each corresponding market was entered

exitMarket(address).details: Sender must not have an outstanding borrow balance in the asset,  or be providing necessary collateral for an outstanding borrow.

params.cTokenAddress: The address of the asset to be removed

returns._0: Whether or not the account successfully exited the market
(possible error code (semi-opaque), account liquidity in excess of collateral requirements,          account shortfall below collateral requirements)

getAllMarkets().details: The automatic getter may be used to access an individual market.

returns._0: The list of market addresses

params.account: The address of the account to pull assets for

returns._0: A dynamic list with the assets the account has entered

params.token: The address of the token to be query

returns._0: The address of cToken
The address of LHB

params.account: The account to determine liquidity for
params.borrowAmount: The amount of underlying to hypothetically borrow
params.cTokenModify: The market to hypothetically redeem/borrow in
params.redeemTokens: The number of tokens to hypothetically redeem

returns._0: (possible error code (semi-opaque), hypothetical account liquidity in excess of collateral requirements,          hypothetical account shortfall below collateral requirements)

params.cTokenBorrowed: Asset which was borrowed by the borrower
params.cTokenCollateral: Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized
params.liquidator: The address repaying the borrow and seizing the collateral
params.repayAmount: The amount of underlying being repaid

params.actualRepayAmount: The amount of underlying being repaid
params.cTokenBorrowed: Asset which was borrowed by the borrower
params.cTokenCollateral: Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized
params.liquidator: The address repaying the borrow and seizing the collateral

params.actualRepayAmount: The amount of cTokenBorrowed underlying to convert into cTokenCollateral tokens
params.cTokenBorrowed: The address of the borrowed cToken
params.cTokenCollateral: The address of the collateral cToken

returns._0: (errorCode, number of cTokenCollateral tokens to be seized in a liquidation)

params.cToken: The market to verify the mint against
params.mintAmount: The amount of underlying being supplied to the market in exchange for tokens
params.minter: The account which would get the minted tokens

returns._0: 0 if the mint is allowed, otherwise a semi-opaque error code (See ErrorReporter.sol)

params.actualMintAmount: The amount of the underlying asset being minted
params.mintTokens: The number of tokens being minted

params.cToken: The market to verify the redeem against
params.redeemTokens: The number of cTokens to exchange for the underlying asset in the market
params.redeemer: The account which would redeem the tokens

returns._0: 0 if the redeem is allowed, otherwise a semi-opaque error code (See ErrorReporter.sol)

params.redeemAmount: The amount of the underlying asset being redeemed
params.redeemTokens: The number of tokens being redeemed

params.borrower: The account which would borrowed the asset
params.cToken: The market to verify the repay against
params.payer: The account which would repay the asset
params.repayAmount: The amount of the underlying asset the account would repay

returns._0: 0 if the repay is allowed, otherwise a semi-opaque error code (See ErrorReporter.sol)

params.actualRepayAmount: The amount of underlying being repaid

params.cTokenBorrowed: Asset which was borrowed by the borrower
params.cTokenCollateral: Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized
params.liquidator: The address repaying the borrow and seizing the collateral
params.seizeTokens: The number of collateral tokens to seize

params.cTokenBorrowed: Asset which was borrowed by the borrower
params.cTokenCollateral: Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized
params.liquidator: The address repaying the borrow and seizing the collateral
params.seizeTokens: The number of collateral tokens to seize

params.cToken: The market to verify the transfer against
params.dst: The account which receives the tokens
params.src: The account which sources the tokens
params.transferTokens: The number of cTokens to transfer

returns._0: 0 if the transfer is allowed, otherwise a semi-opaque error code (See ErrorReporter.sol)

params.dst: The account which receives the tokens
params.src: The account which sources the tokens

ActionPaused(address,string,bool).notice: Emitted when an action is paused on a market

ActionPaused(string,bool).notice: Emitted when an action is paused globally

CompGranted(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when LHB is granted by admin

CompSpeedUpdated(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a new LHB speed is calculated for a market

DistributedBorrowerComp(address,address,.notice: Emitted when LHB is distributed to a borrower

DistributedSupplierComp(address,address,.notice: Emitted when LHB is distributed to a supplier

MarketComped(address,bool).notice: Emitted when market comped status is changed

MarketEntered(address,address).notice: Emitted when an account enters a market

MarketExited(address,address).notice: Emitted when an account exits a market

MarketListed(address).notice: Emitted when an admin supports a market

NewBorrowCap(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when borrow cap for a cToken is changed

NewBorrowCapGuardian(address,address).notice: Emitted when borrow cap guardian is changed

NewCloseFactor(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when close factor is changed by admin

NewCollateralFactor(address,uint256,uint.notice: Emitted when a collateral factor is changed by admin

NewCompRate(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when LHB rate is changed

NewLiquidationIncentive(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when liquidation incentive is changed by admin

NewPauseGuardian(address,address).notice: Emitted when pause guardian is changed

NewPriceOracle(address,address).notice: Emitted when price oracle is changed

_addCompMarkets(address[]).notice: Add markets to compMarkets, allowing them to earn LHB in the flywheel

_dropCompMarket(address).notice: Remove a market from compMarkets, preventing it from earning LHB in the flywheel

_setBorrowCapGuardian(address).notice: Admin function to change the Borrow Cap Guardian

_setCloseFactor(uint256).notice: Sets the closeFactor used when liquidating borrows

_setCollateralFactor(address,uint256).notice: Sets the collateralFactor for a market

_setCompRate(uint256).notice: Set the amount of LHB distributed per block

_setMarketBorrowCaps(address[],uint256[].notice: Set the given borrow caps for the given cToken markets. Borrowing that brings total borrows to or above borrow cap will revert.

_setPauseGuardian(address).notice: Admin function to change the Pause Guardian

_setPriceOracle(address).notice: Sets a new price oracle for the comptroller

_supportMarket(address).notice: Add the market to the markets mapping and set it as listed

accountAssets(address,uint256).notice: Per-account mapping of "assets you are in", capped by maxAssets

borrowAllowed(address,address,uint256).notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to borrow the underlying asset of the given market

borrowVerify(address,address,uint256).notice: Validates borrow and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

checkMembership(address,address).notice: Returns whether the given account is entered in the given asset

claimComp(address).notice: Claim all the LHB accrued by holder in all markets

claimComp(address,address[]).notice: Claim all the LHB accrued by holder in the specified markets

claimComp(address[],address[],bool,bool).notice: Claim all LHB accrued by the holders

closeFactorMantissa().notice: Multiplier used to calculate the maximum repayAmount when liquidating a borrow

compAccrued(address).notice: The LHB accrued but not yet transferred to each user

compBorrowState(address).notice: The LHB market borrow state for each market

compBorrowerIndex(address,address).notice: The LHB borrow index for each market for each borrower as of the last time they accrued LHB

compClaimThreshold().notice: The threshold above which the flywheel transfers LHB, in wei

compInitialIndex().notice: The initial LHB index for a market

compRate().notice: The rate at which the flywheel distributes LHB, per block

compSpeeds(address).notice: The portion of compRate that each market currently receives

compSupplierIndex(address,address).notice: The LHB borrow index for each market for each supplier as of the last time they accrued LHB

compSupplyState(address).notice: The LHB market supply state for each market

enterMarkets(address[]).notice: Add assets to be included in account liquidity calculation

exitMarket(address).notice: Removes asset from sender's account liquidity calculation

getAccountLiquidity(address).notice: Determine the current account liquidity wrt collateral requirements

getAssetsIn(address).notice: Returns the assets an account has entered

getCTokenAddress(address).notice: Return the cToken address of the token

getCompAddress().notice: Return the address of the LHB token

getHypotheticalAccountLiquidity(address,.notice: Determine what the account liquidity would be if the given amounts were redeemed/borrowed

isComptroller().notice: Indicator that this is a Comptroller contract (for inspection)

liquidateBorrowAllowed(address,address,a.notice: Checks if the liquidation should be allowed to occur

liquidateBorrowVerify(address,address,ad.notice: Validates liquidateBorrow and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

liquidateCalculateSeizeTokens(address,ad.notice: Calculate number of tokens of collateral asset to seize given an underlying amount

liquidationIncentiveMantissa().notice: Multiplier representing the discount on collateral that a liquidator receives

markets(address).notice: Official mapping of cTokens -> Market metadata

maxAssets().notice: Max number of assets a single account can participate in (borrow or use as collateral)

mintAllowed(address,address,uint256).notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to mint tokens in the given market

mintVerify(address,address,uint256,uint2.notice: Validates mint and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

oracle().notice: Oracle which gives the price of any given asset

pauseGuardian().notice: The Pause Guardian can pause certain actions as a safety mechanism.  Actions which allow users to remove their own assets cannot be paused.  Liquidation / seizing / transfer can only be paused globally, not by market.

redeemAllowed(address,address,uint256).notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to redeem tokens in the given market

redeemVerify(address,address,uint256,uin.notice: Validates redeem and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

refreshCompSpeeds().notice: Recalculate and update LHB speeds for all LHB markets

repayBorrowAllowed(address,address,addre.notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to repay a borrow in the given market

repayBorrowVerify(address,address,addres.notice: Validates repayBorrow and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

seizeAllowed(address,address,address,add.notice: Checks if the seizing of assets should be allowed to occur

seizeVerify(address,address,address,addr.notice: Validates seize and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

transferAllowed(address,address,address,.notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to transfer tokens in the given market

transferVerify(address,address,address,u.notice: Validates transfer and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.
